existing_features.title: In the Pricing section, add a short note under each pricing plan (Basic, Standard, Premium) that states “$50 deposit required” and includes a brief, clear reason (e.g., that the deposit covers initial work like creating a website preview/prototype before full development). Use English for the new user-facing copy and keep the note visually subordinate to the plan description (small text / muted styling) while still readable in the dark theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a "$50 deposit required" note under each pricing plan with brief reasoning (e.g., to build a website preview).

projectName: Add $50 deposit note with brief reasoning under each pricing plan
